user_interface
Interface IUserInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
TextInterface
public interface IUserInterface

Interface used to specify what a user interface for the flight system needs to at least do. Used to abstract the model (flight system) from the view (the user interface).

Author:
Richard Walker

Returns:
the departure airport as a string from the user.

Returns:

roundTrip

java.lang.String roundTrip()
Ask user if they want to book a round trip.

Returns:
the user's answer. Should be a "yes" or a "no".

getReturnDate

java.lang.String getReturnDate()
Used to ask the user what date they want to return.

Returns:
the return date (day) as a string from the user.

isFirstClassSeat

java.lang.String isFirstClassSeat()
Used to ask the user if they want 1st class seating or not.

The user answer should start with a 'y' for yes and a 'n' for no.

Returns:
the "yes" or "no" as a string.

void numOfFlights(int numOfFlights)
Displays a message that tells the user how many flights fit their search criteria.

Parameters:
numOfFlights - the number of available flights
